title: Eureka Blaze Stick Vacuum Cleaner, Powerful Suction 3-in-1 Small Handheld Vac with Filter for Hard Floor Lightweight Upright Home Pet Hair, Dark Black
description: We know you value a clean home and Eureka is proud to offer whole home cleaning solutions to make life a little easier.

Eureka Blaze Stick Vacuum Cleaner is the perfect cleaning companion for your tiny house to live in! This powerful yet lightweight vacuum boasts an impressive suction power, making it ideal for cleaning tiles and hard floors.

Equipped with a large, easy-to-clean dust cup and washable filter, this handheld vacuum makes cleaning a breeze. The capture nozzle easily picks up larger debris, while the advanced swivel steering allows for effortless maneuverability around furniture and stairs.

The 18-feet power cord provides ample reach for cleaning larger areas, and multiple accessories help clean hard-to-reach crevices and furniture, making this mini vacuum a college dorm room essentials for girls. Don't let its cheap price fool you. Upgrade your cleaning game today!
Warning: When using the vacuum cleaner, the floor brush may be clogged by hairs and dirt. We recommend cleaning the roller brush and the belt every 2 weeks.
Long-term failure to clean may cause malfunction, or even risk of smoke and belt broken.
